Actions.Text: AMEND (T) AND RECOMMIT TO ELECTION LAW

Title: Relates to absentee voting
Summary: Authorizes absentee voting; defines the term "illness" for the purposes of absentee voting to include the spread or potential spread of any communicable disease, at a time of declaration of a state of emergency within the jurisdiction where the election is taking place.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the election law, in relation to absentee voting
